definition: lit. Even if we don't see each other, don't give up and leave (idiom)/fig. Be sure to wait!/See you there!
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: We'll waiting for you tomorrow at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 我們明天同一時間不見不散。

sentences.english: We see tomorrow at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們明天同一時間不見不散。

sentences.english: Usual place. Be there or be square.
See you at the subway station six o' clock.
sentences.chinese: 六點鐘地鐵站，不見不散啊。
明天同一時間不見不散。

sentences.english: We made an appointment there or be square of the time and place.
sentences.chinese: 我們約好不見不散的時間與地點。

sentences.english: We'll see you tomorrow at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 明天我們同一時間不見不散。

sentences.english: There's a huge party on Friday night; be there or be square.
sentences.chinese: 在星期五晚上有一個大型的聚會，大家不見不散。

sentences.english: Make sure that you meet us on the Caribbean street of beach in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海的加勒比海灘街區，我們不見不散。
